lang_title: 歡迎來到EQL - PC Stick網站
lang_pcperformance_cont: 搭配四核心 Intel® AtomTM 處理器，運算不輸人
lang_HDMI_cont: 開/關電腦棒時會自動開啟/關閉外部螢幕(僅限於支援HDMI CEC的螢幕/電視/投影機)
lang_SKT_cont: 透過APP將手機中的多媒體檔案分享至螢幕
lang_pluginfor_cont: 插進螢幕/電視，即可開始使用
lang_usb_cont: 可任意搭配使用市場上的USB裝置
lang_sysrdy_cont: 搭載 Intel® 處理器並採用 Windows® 10 讓效能大幅提升
lang_howtoinstall_tl: 手機是最方便的小幫手
lang_howtoinstall_cont: 操作螢幕手勢文字輸入多媒體分享 (音樂、圖片、youtube…)
lang_wireinstall_tl: 插入螢幕即可立即使用
lang_wireinstall_cont: 內附HDMI延長線，使用上無死角
lang_spec_iocont:
HDMI螢幕連接介面
USB2.0X1
Micro USB電源輸入
lang_Share_media: 給您更方便的方式來分享影音媒體
lang_iOS_tl: iOS 裝置請至 APP Store 下載
lang_Android_tl: Android 裝置請至 Google Play 商店下載
lang_Android_ver: 最低需求 Android 4.0 or 4.0+ version
lang_footer_subtitle: EQL brings you an easier and smarter lifestyle

lang_smartestpc_cont: A pocket-size PC only 11 cm long and 9.8mm thick
lang_pcperformance_cont: Provides all the computing functions as the same as a full-sized computer
lang_HDMI_cont: Power on/off PC Stick, CEC-enabled TV will power on/off automatically
lang_SKT_cont: Share pictures, videos and files from mobile device to TV or display
lang_pluginfor_cont: Simply plug PC stick into the HDMI port then transform any HDMI TV or display into a computer
lang_usb_cont: Stand USB connector is compatible with any stand accessories
lang_sysrdy_cont: Latest system is ready for you
lang_easy2use_cont:
It's ultra light weight and pocket-size
fitting all your needs
lang_howtoinstall_tl: To control, cellphone is all you need
lang_howtoinstall_cont:
Mouse gesture and text input
Media streaming (music, photos, youtube…)
lang_wireinstall_tl: Just plug in and use it right away
lang_wireinstall_cont: Dual usage , you can directly plug into your monitor / TV /Projector. Or simply extend by HDMI cable.
lang_footer_subtitle: EQL brings you an easier and smarter lifestyle
